name: Chatham - Opoly
description:
Chatham - Opoly is a monopoly-style game that celebrates the great town of Chatham, Illinois. Buy, trade, and sell your favorite Chatham properties, businesses, organizations, and service providers as you strive to be the last player with the most money who has not gone bankrupt. Play Chatham - Opoly today!

Optional game features with Registration:

* 2D/2.5D/3D game play modes
* Change game draw cards
* Change player names and avatars
* Change game play money amounts
